    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddBooking
    Command to add a new booking to the flight booking system.
    AddBookingWindow
    This class represents a window for adding a new booking in the flight booking system.
    AddCustomer
    Command to add a new customer to the flight booking system.
    AddCustomerWindow
    This class represents a window for adding a new customer in the flight booking system.
    AddFlight
    Command to add a new flight to the flight booking system.
    AddFlightWindow
    This class represents a window for adding a new flight in the flight booking system.
    AdditionalTests
     
    Authenticator
    The Authenticator class handles user authentication for the flight booking system.
    Booking
    This class represents a booking in the Flight Booking System.
    BookingDataManager
    Manages the loading and storing of booking data for the Flight Booking System.
    BookingTest
     
    CancelBooking
    Command to cancel an existing booking in the flight booking system.
    CancelBookingWindow
    This class represents a window for canceling an existing booking in the flight booking system.
    Command
    The Command interface represents an executable command in the flight booking system.
    CommandParser
    This class is responsible for parsing commands from the user input.
    Customer
    Represents a customer in the flight booking system.
    CustomerDataManager
     
    CustomerListWindow
    This class represents a window that displays a list of customers in the flight booking system.
    CustomerTest
     
    DataManager
    The DataManager interface defines the methods required for loading and storing data for the FlightBookingSystem.
    DeleteCustomer
    The DeleteCustomer class represents a command to delete a customer from the flight booking system.
    DeleteFlight
    The DeleteFlight class represents a command to delete a flight from the flight booking system.
    FilterFlightsWindow
    This class represents a window for filtering flights in the flight booking system.
    Flight
    Represents a flight in the flight booking system.
    FlightBookingSystem
    Represents the flight booking system, managing customers, flights, and bookings.
    FlightBookingSystemData
    The FlightBookingSystemData class is responsible for managing the loading and storing of data for the FlightBookingSystem.
    FlightBookingSystemException
    This class represents an exception specific to the Flight Booking System.
    FlightBookingSystemTest
     
    FlightDataManager
    The FlightDataManager class is responsible for loading and storing flight data to and from a file.
    FlightTest
     
    Help
    The Help class represents a command to display the help message containing a list of available commands.
    ListCustomers
    Command implementation that lists all customers in the flight booking system.
    ListFlights
    Command implementation that lists all flights in the flight booking system.
    LoadGUI
    Command implementation that launches the graphical user interface (GUI) for the flight booking system.
    LoginWindow
    This class represents the login window for the flight booking system.
    Main
    The main class for the Flight Booking System application.
    MainWindow
    This class represents the main window of the flight booking system.
    Role
    The Role enum represents the different roles a user can have in the flight booking system.
    ShowCustomer
    Command implementation that displays the details of a specific customer in the flight booking system.
    ShowFlight
    Command implementation that displays the detailed information of a specific flight in the flight booking system.
    UpdateBooking
    Command implementation that updates an existing booking to a new flight.
    UpdateBookingWindow
    This class represents a window for updating an existing booking in the flight booking system.
    UpdateCustomer
    Command implementation that updates the personal information of an existing customer in the flight booking system.
    UpdateCustomerWindow
    This class represents a window for updating customer information.
    User
    The User class represents a user in the flight booking system.
